thread.title: Georgia are hot favourites to join Pro12 | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Georgia are hot favourites to join Pro12 | Daily Mail Online

author: Rob Robertson For The Scottish Daily Mail
title: Georgia are hot favourites to join Pro12 | Daily Mail Online
text: Georgia are hot favourites to join Pro12 ahead of Germany... expanding the competition opens up brave new world of opportunity Pro12 could expand in countries including Georgia, Germany, USA and Canada There is a realistic chance that at least one — if not all — of these countries could be part of a new set-up over the next three years Germany have devised a £25million infrastructure investment plan Hot favourite to beat them to it is Georgia where rugby is the national sport Out of all the countries that the Pro12 have been talking to, they seem to tick all the boxes
